text: Elizabeth Barchas Prelogar (born 1980) is an American lawyer. In January 2021, she became acting Solicitor General of the United States. In August 2021, President Joe Biden nominated her to serve as the permanent Solicitor General. She was confirmed by the United States Senate on October 28, 2021. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Idaho Category:United States Solicitors General Category:People from Boise, Idaho Category:Politicians from Idaho Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Emory University alumni Category:Alumni of the University of St Andrews
title: Elizabeth Prelogar
